import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { publicUser } from "../../../../../../globals/route-names"; import SectionSideAdvert from "./section-side-advert"; import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; function SectionJobsSidebar2({ _config }) { const { jobId } = useParams(); const [jobData, setJobData] = useState(null); const [applicationCount, setApplicationCount] = useState(0); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { const fetchJobData = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get(`${process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL}/post-job/${jobId}`); const applicationsRes = await axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/job/applications/${jobId}`); if (applicationsRes.data) { setApplicationCount(applicationsRes.data.applicationCount); } setJobData(response.data); } catch (err) { setError("Error fetching job data"); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; fetchJobData(); }, [jobId]); if (loading) return
Loading...
; if (error) return
{error}
; return ( <>

Job Information

  • Date Posted
  • 600 Views
  • {applicationCount} Applicants
  • Date Posted
    {new Date(jobData?.startDate).toLocaleDateString()}
  • Location
    {jobData?.location}
  • Job Title
    {jobData?.jobtitle}
  • Experience
    {jobData?.experience} Year
  • Qualification
    {jobData?.qualification}
  • Gender
    {jobData?.gender}
  • Offered Salary
    {jobData?.offeredsalary}
{_config.showJobInfo && (

Senior Web Designer, Developer

  • Company
    {jobData?.userId?.companyName}
  • Phone
    {jobData?.userId?.phone}
  • Email
    {jobData?.userId?.email}
  • Website
    {jobData?.userId?.Website}
  • Address
    {jobData?.completeaddress}
View Profile
)}
); } export default SectionJobsSidebar2;
